inputs.name: abbeNumber
inputs.label: Dispersion Abbe Number
inputs.description: Control the dispersion of light via the Abbe number.  A value of zero means no disperson.  Typical values are in the range of 20 (high dispersion) to 84 (low disperson.)

inputs.name: normal
inputs.label: Normal
inputs.description: Surface normal modulator via bump or normal maps.
